means: 不顾，不理会，无视( disregard的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The board completely disregarded my recommendations.
sentence.Network_cn: 董事会完全无视我的建议。

sentence.Network_en: He utterly disregarded my warnings and met with on accident.
sentence.Network_cn: 他全然不听我的警告,结果出了事故.

sentence.Network_en: Your objections are inconsequential and may be disregarded.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的反对意见并不重要,不会受到重视.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He disregarded Tom , and spoke straight to me ., 他没理会汤姆 , 直接对我说话.
The feeling that his clerical character had been wholly disregarded sorely vexed him ., 他感到自己的教士身份完全被置之不顾 , 这使他心里异常恼火.
gravitational interaction is disregarded when interactions between individual protons are considered., 在考虑单个质子间相互作用时 , 万有引力可以忽略不计.
We regret to say that you have disregarded our shipping instructions ., 你方忽视了我们的装船要求 , 我们感到遗憾.

list.abs: ...，即被告或者明知错误仍然坚持发表，或者对事件真相“贸然不顾”（reckless disregard）。
...真实仍发表；B、虽非明知不实，但出于不论真实与否的轻率（Reckless Disregard），二者都仍然要负法律责任。
disqualification order 取消资格令disregarded income 计算入息豁免额dissolution 解散
...听者的诠释者当然得“虚己”，用伽达默尔的话说，要“丢弃自己”（disregarding ourselves）。

entry.def: If you disregard something, you ignore it or do not take account of it.

example.ex: He disregarded the advice of his executives...
example.tran: 他对主管层的建议置若罔闻。

example.ex: Critics say he allowed the police and security forces to disregard human rights.
example.tran: 批评人士说他听任警察和安全部队漠视人权。

sentences.sentence: "her aching muscles forgotten she danced all night"
"he was scolded for his forgotten chores"

auth_sentence.content: Washington has disregarded the threat and proceeded as normal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Washington has disregarded the threat and proceeded as normal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Washington has disregarded the threat and proceeded as normal.

auth_sentence.content: Virginia...felt the outsider: unwanted, left behind, disregarded.
auth_sentence.res_content: Virginia...felt the outsider: unwanted, left behind, disregarded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Virginia...felt the outsider: unwanted, left behind, disregarded.

auth_sentence.content: It was like all her world titles had been disregarded.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was like all her world titles had been disregarded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was like all her world titles had been disregarded.
